sentences.en: a select gathering of 20 or 30 people
sentences.cn: 二三十名特邀人士的聚会

sentences.en: Among the speakers at the gathering was Treasury Secretary Nicholas Brady.
sentences.cn: 与会的发言人中有财政部长尼古拉斯·布莱迪。

sentences.en: Dr Ryan travelled the world gathering material for his book.
sentences.cn: 瑞安博士周游世界为他的书搜集资料。

sentences.en: Gathering up all his courage, he turned to face the enemy.
sentences.cn: 他鼓足勇气, 转身面对敌人.

sentences.en: Gathering up his scattered papers, he pushed them into his case.
sentences.cn: 他把散乱的文件收拾起来, 塞进文件夹里.

sentences.en: In the gathering gloom it was difficult to see anything distinctly.
sentences.cn: 在越来越暗的情况下,什么东西都看不清.

sentences.en: Many of the machines are gathering dust in basements.
sentences.cn: 许多机器尘封在地下室里。

sentences.en: She spent all day yesterday tramping the streets, gathering evidence.
sentences.cn: 她昨天一整天都在街上四处奔走，搜集证据。

sentences.en: The aircraft bumped along erratically without gathering anything like sufficient speed.
sentences.cn: 飞机忽上忽下，飞行很不平稳，根本未达到应有的速度。

sentences.en: The clouds are gathering together and it's going to rain.
The job involves gathering and analysing data.
sentences.cn: 这项工作包括搜集和分析资料。

sentences.en: The lighthouse beam was quite distinct in the gathering dusk.
sentences.cn: 灯塔的光束在渐浓的暮色中清晰可见。

sentences.en: The police are still questioning witnesses and gathering information.
sentences.cn: 警方仍在讯问目击证人以搜集信息.

sentences.en: There were ominous dark clouds gathering overhead.
sentences.cn: 不祥的阴霾在头顶上汇聚。

sentences.en: They have their own independence movement which is gathering strength.
sentences.cn: 他们自己发起了独立运动，其力量正逐渐壮大。

sentences.en: We will be exploring different approaches to gathering information.
sentences.cn: 我们将探索收集信息的不同方法。

words.tran_cn: 收集；收割；使…聚集；使…皱起

trans.tran_en: a meeting of a group of people

trans.tran_cn: （使）聚集( gather的现在分词)，集合，推断，了解
